summary: DOD is acquiring new space systems as its older ones near completion. This testimony discusses DOD's ongoing space acquisition challenges and opportunities. Our prior work found that DOD space programs often exceed their budgets and are late. For several decades, we've identified best practices to improve acquisition outcomes, including having strong program oversight and empowering managers. title: Space Acquisitions: DOD Faces Challenges and Opportunities with Acquiring Space Systems in a Changing Environment
